page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content:
I spend my time reading novels and doing homework. After school I get changed and I spend my time by watching half an hour of television or if I need to go down town I go down town. Then I start doing my homework for about half an hour. Afterwards I have a cup of tea and a biscuit and watch another half an hour's television. I have my cup of tea and read a chapter of the present book I am reading. Then I have my tea (food). After my tea I start doing another hour of homework. Then I get into bed and read another chapter of my book, and I go to sleep. That is how I spend my own time.
Sakia Bakar Age 13.
